generic.notReadyYet: This section is not ready yet!
generic.comeBackLater: Come back on the next update and it may be ready ^^

home.title: Wellcome to VS Launcher
home.description: The unofficial Vintage Story Launcher with all the features you need.

versions.noVersionsFoundDesc: Install a new one on the {{link}} page
versions.searchForInstalledVersion: Search for an already installed version
versions.areYouSureUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall this version?
versions.uninstallingNotReversible: Uninstalling is not reversible but you can download the same version again.

installations.folderInUse: Be careful, this folder is in use by another installation!
installations.recomendedNewFolder: It's recomended to use a clean folder for each installation but if you already had the game installed you can select the same folder you was using before and it'll use those worlds, mods and so on.
installations.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this installation?
installations.ifDontDeleteData: If you dont delete data you will be able to access it here:
installations.noInstallationsAvailableSub: Create a new one on the Installations page
installations.openOnFileExplorer: Open folder on the file explorer

gameRunningOverlay.title: GAME RUNNING
gameRunningOverlay.desc: The game is running in the background, please, close it to use VS Launcher!
gameRunningOverlay.subDesc: You cant use VS Launcher while playing to prevent any conflicts with the game.

tasksOverlay.error: An error has ocurred during the process!

body.errorExecutingGame: An error ocurred while executing the game!
body.folderDoesntExists: The folder doesn't exist! Execute the game first!
body.versionNotFoundOnTheFolder: No version found in that folder!
body.versionInstallationFailed: An error ocurred while installing version {{version}}!
body.versionUninstallationFailed: An error ocurred while uninstalling version {{version}}!
body.installationAddingError: An error ocurred while adding installation {{name}}!
body.installationDeletingError: An error ocurred while deleting installation {{name}}!
body.installationEditingError: An error ocurred while editing installation {{name}}!
body.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded succesfully! Restart VS Launcher to update.
